title: How to Pray the Rosary
description: A simple guide on how to pray the Rosary. The Rosary prayer actually consists of a series of smaller prayers, all of which take about twenty to thirty minutes to pray. In this brief introduction, we will walk through them together. Find more videos and resources at https://wordonfire.org/rosary.
dc:creator: Bishop Robert Barron
